member.summary: Spots this business has. Ignored when seralizing as a JSON to avoid a circular loop

member.summary: Time at which this business opens (Date ignored)

member.name: P:Spot.Common.Business.CloseTime
member.summary: Time at which this business closes (Date ignored)

member.name: T:Spot.Common.ISpotBase
member.summary: Holds the *absolute base* properties needed for an item in Spot

member.name: F:Spot.Common.ReservationStatus.PENDING
member.summary: Reservation is pending and has not been used

member.name: F:Spot.Common.ReservationStatus.MISSED
member.summary: Reservation was missed, and is no longer valid

member.name: F:Spot.Common.ReservationStatus.IN_PROGRESS
member.summary: Reservation is currently being used and is in progress

member.name: F:Spot.Common.ReservationStatus.COMPLETED
member.summary: Reservation is completed and was used

member.name: F:Spot.Common.ReservationStatus.CANCELLED
member.summary: Reservation was cancelled (either by business or reservation owner) and is no longer valid

member.summary: Date and time this reservation starts

member.name: P:Spot.Common.Reservation.End
member.summary: Date and time this reservetion ends

member.summary: Whether or not this user is an owner or not

member.name: P:Spot.Common.User.Reservations
member.summary: Reservations this user has. Ignored when seralizing as a JSON to avoid a circular loop.
